post_text:
We are getting a great amount of fundraiser order forms back. Thank you for supporting the PTO! We plan to make more frequent posts on Facebook about how we are supporting our students and staff at both HES and Hopkins.
--> Please note that all gift cards cost the exact price they are purchased for. The percentage next to the gift card amount is what the PTO earns from the purchase.
--> Here are a handful of local stores that donate a higher percentage to our school:
Barnes & Noble 8%
L.L. Bean 13%
Bath & Body Works 13%
Cinemark tickets 10%
Chili's 10%
Texas Roadhouse 8%
Old Navy 14%
T.J. Maxx and Marshall's 7%
--> Every Friday is (unofficially) spirt wear day at HES. Please encourage your students to wear their spirit wear or school colors (blue & gold) on Fridays!!

post_text: Book Fair is next week and Family Night is Wednesday, 11/6 from 5:30-7pm, Hadley Elementary Cafe. Bring the family! Get some Holiday shopping done and support Hadley PTO. The book fair provides books for the library, teacherâ€™s classrooms, scholastic news and more. Stop by and say hello. The sixth grade celebration basketball clinics will be in the gym. Have the kids join the clinic and browse the large selection of books and gifts for sale. We look forward to seeing you. ðŸ˜ŠðŸ“š

The PTO would like to give a special shout out to Melissa Aloisi, Deanna Aloisi, Rebecca DiBartolomeo, and Danielle Gaudette for coordinating and distributing our MCAS snacks!! This brightens up test taking for the children. A lot of hard work goes into this project. Thank you to ALL of our volunteers ðŸ’›

post_text:
The Hadley PTO would like to thank all of our Field Day volunteers for their help today. It was a great success!! After a school year of hard work -- today was focused on packing in as much fun as possible.
The (soaked) children had smiles from ear to ear. There's nothing like listening to squeals of children's laughter on a beautiful sunny day.
The PTO would especially like to thank Sarah Frost, our field day coordinator, Ms. Dowd, our amazing and fun principal, and Greg Stewart, our very talented DJ! You helped make the day extra special for the children!
We would also like to give special thanks to the Hadley Fire Department for the spray down! The children had a blast, literally ðŸš’ðŸ’¦ And thank you to our teachers for your support and patience.
Please feel free to contact the Hadley PTO if you would like to be part of our Field Day committee for next year. As always we encourage and welcome teachers and parents to be part of planning and organizing all our events!!

post_text:
The Hadley PTO would like to especially thank Kristin Yezierski for coordinating and running our May Book Fair -- she was there for the entire duration of the Fair with her new baby in tow. We would also like to thank Meghan Campbell and all of the parents who volunteered to make the Book Fair run smoothly. It was a great success and as always, the children enjoyed it!

We would also like to thank Cassie Stewart for her hard work organizing Teacher's Appreciation Week. A big thank you to everyone who volunteered to donate time or items for the teachers. Cassie did an amazing job planning this event! We appreciate all of the efforts and hard work from our teachers all year long!

Thank you all -- You are what makes a successful PTO!!

This is a friendly reminder that lottery calendar stubs and payment are due in to the Hadley Elementary main office ASAP. Please also return any unsold calendars should you have any.

Some of you may have already submitted payment at the time of your request (thank you!!) but please make sure to turn in your stubs to make sure they will be logged/validated and to ensure that we have the necessary information should you win!

If you've earned free calendars they will be sent home with your student this week once we've received all stubs/payment (please remember to return the free stubs as well) .

post_text:
ðŸ¦…â­ï¸Special Announcementâ­ï¸ðŸ¦…
The Hadley PTO is excited to announce that we will be purchasing EVERY student at HES a short sleeve school spirit t-shirt!!! Order forms will be distributed in backpacks soon -- please be on the lookout! You may purchase additional t-shirts and/or hoodie sweatshirts on the order form as well. All spiritwear is navy blue with gold print and true to size. Below is Lane (age 4 1/2) wearing a youth XS (4-5).
With this exciting news, we have decided to extend our lotto calendar fundraiser for another 2 weeks. Please try to help us supplement the cost of t-shirts by selling or purchasing a calendar. We are also accepting donations if you are not interested in fundraising. To request a calendar please email hadleypto@gmail.com. Payment and stubs are due ASAP! We are only able to honor tickets that have been paid for with stubs returned by 3/1. Thank you and we hope you love our spiritwear as much as we do!!

We are so Thankful to be part of our wonderful community! The weather couldn't stop our Share the Love Outback or dampen the enthusiasm of the Hadley Elementary School Student Council!! We were so happy to be able to help pack up and deliver a car FULL of food to the Hadley Food Pantry this morning. Congratulations to HES students & families for a very sucessful Food Drive!!! #SharetheLoveEvent2018
